scripts.docker:tag:prime: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); sha=$(git rev-parse $branch); docker tag $npm_package_config_imageName $npm_package_config_imageRepo:$branch
scripts.docker:tag:staging: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); sha=$(git rev-parse $branch); docker tag $npm_package_config_imageName $npm_package_config_imageRepo:$branch
scripts.docker:push:staging: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); sha=$(git rev-parse $branch); docker push $npm_package_config_imageRepo:$branch
scripts.docker:push:prime: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); sha=$(git rev-parse $branch); docker push $npm_package_config_imageRepo:$branch
scripts.helm:upgrade:staging: cd chart && branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); sha=$(git rev-parse --short $branch); helm upgrade --install --namespace=default asset-scraper --values=asm-testing-staging-values.yaml --set=node-web-service.image.tag=$branch-$sha .
